description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle out against your fiends with Dogfight SKETCH! - the ultimate World War 2 aerial fighting contest!  Set in a world of wartime sketches and doodles, you must skilfully avoid your enemy's fire and boldly take down your foe in a blaze of victorious glory! Who will be the champion?
